name: ChromaDex Corporation
description: ChromaDex Corporation is a global leader in the development and commercialization of innovative dietary supplements and nutraceuticals, primarily focused on the research and development of natural products. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, ChromaDex aims to improve the quality of life through science-based products that enhance health and wellness. The company's flagship ingredient, Tru Niagen, is a patented form of nicotinamide riboside (NR) that is designed to elevate levels of NAD+, a coenzyme critical for cellular function and energy metabolism. ChromaDex partners with various brands and companies to supply its ingredients and technologies, promoting health benefits that include enhanced energy levels, improved metabolism, and potential longevity effects. The company is committed to rigorous scientific research and quality assurance, ensuring that its products meet the highest standards of efficacy and safety. ChromaDex's mission is to empower individuals to live healthier lives through science and innovation.
